### Session Objectives

- Determining the root using Cytotrace
- Pseudotime analysis using Monocle3
- Cell-cell communication using CellChat
- Gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) using clusterProfiler
- Pathway/transcription factor inference using decoupleR
